title: PearFinch’s Cybernetic Battle BGM

longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Music package specialized for SF RPG environments!
<!--text-->
PearFinch’s Cybernetic Battle BGM is a music package designed specifically for science-fiction RPG environments. Many songs are utilizable during enemy encounters or bosses due to their high-energy nature; however, additional songs have been included in this pack that are more atmospheric.

This special soundtrack package contains many unique features. Each song on the soundtrack is distinct, using different instruments and emotional changeups. 

Strong synthetic square leads, flutes, piano, and breakbeat percussion characterizes the soundtrack with a serious and futuristic RPG atmosphere.

The melodies are very free-form and dynamic, leading to re-playable tracks that can excite and ignite!

*******************************************
